TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReadOnlyArrayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ReadOnlyArrayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ReadOnlyArrayAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 當套用至 Windows 執行階段元件中的陣列參數時，會指定傳遞至該參數的陣列內容只能用於輸入。

span.span: When applied to an array parameter in a Windows Runtime component, specifies that the contents of the array that is passed to that parameter are used only for input.

summary.span: 呼叫端必須確保呼叫不會變更陣列。

span.span: The caller expects the array to be unchanged by the call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中的陣列參數您[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]元件傳值方式傳遞 (`ByVal` Visual Basic 中)，您必須對其套用下列屬性的其中之一：If an array parameter in your [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component is passed by value (`ByVal` in Visual Basic), you must apply one of the following attributes to it: - 套用屬性，如果您想要用於只輸入陣列的內容。Apply the attribute if you intend the contents of the array to be used for input only. - 套用屬性，如果您想要用於僅限輸出陣列的內容 （也就是可設定陣列的內容但不會讀取方法）。Apply the attribute if you intend the contents of the array to be used for output only (that is, the method sets the contents of the array but does not read them). 將這兩個屬性套用至參數將導致錯誤。Applying both attributes to a parameter causes an error. 如需詳細資訊，包括標準模式變更陣列，請參閱[傳遞陣列給 Windows 執行階段元件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=251026)Windows 開發人員中心。For more information, including the standard pattern for making changes to an array, see [Passing arrays to a Windows Runtime component](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=251026) in the Windows Dev Center. > [!IMPORTANT] > 具有參數的屬性行為而有所不同呼叫端是否以原生程式碼或 managed 程式碼撰寫。Parameters that have the attribute behave differently depending on whether the caller is written in native code or managed code. 如果呼叫端的原生程式碼 （JavaScript 或 Visual c + + 元件擴充功能），當呼叫跨越應用程式二進位介面 (ABI) 界限時，就是會複製陣列。If the caller is native code (JavaScript or Visual C++ component extensions), the array is copied when the call crosses the application binary interface (ABI) boundary. 必要時，會轉換項目。Elements are converted if necessary. 因此，呼叫端看不到方法對只限輸入陣列的任何意外變更。Therefore, any accidental changes the method makes to an input-only array are not visible to the caller. > > 如果呼叫端 managed 程式碼中，陣列就不會複製。If the caller is managed code, the array is not copied. 因為它可以在.NET Framework 中的任何方法呼叫中，原始陣列便可呼叫的方法。The original array is available to the called method, as it would be in any method call in the .NET Framework. 陣列內容在 .NET Framework 程式碼中是可變動的，因此呼叫端看得到方法對陣列的任何變更。Array contents are mutable in .NET Framework code, so any changes the method makes to the array are visible to the caller. 這一點很重要，請記住，因為它會影響為 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 元件撰寫的單元測試。This is important to remember because it affects unit tests written for a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component. 如果測試是以 Managed 程式碼撰寫，陣列內容在測試期間就是可變動的。If the tests are written in managed code, the contents of an array will appear to be mutable during testing. 將此屬性套用至參數，其或屬性會匯出模組時，會造成錯誤。Applying this attribute to a parameter that has the or attribute causes an error when the module is exported. 套用至屬性`out`參數也會導致錯誤。Applying the attribute to an `out` parameter also causes an error.
